lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.
You are in the house alone. While you are "exploring" the drawers you notice a stack of Playboy magazines underneath a pile of clothing.
The middle page folds out to show a woman with dark hair and very large breasts sitting on the edge of a bed and combing her hair. Her legs are apart. What is your reaction to this?
Imagine if you ever walked into your room and SHE was sitting like THAT on YOUR bed! You can:
#TAKE OUT THE CENTERFOLD AND KEEP IT

The centerfold girl becomes your favorite fantasy. Enjoy it while you can. You may find it hard to believe, but women like this only exist in Fantasyland. You almost never meet them at the bus stop or in the supermarket!
You sigh and put the magazine back. Why don't any of the girls in your class look like this? Or do they?
You ask yourself many questions. Do all women look like this? How old do you have to get before meeting someone like this? What is this strange feeling I have in my pants? You can:
Perhaps you aren't curious about women yet. That's perfectly O.K. As you get older you may find them much more interesting.
